text:
After installing the tomcat-connectors-1.1M1 jar files in Tomcat 4.1.24
(http://jakarta.apache.org/builds/jakarta-tomcat-connectors/release/v1.1M1/bin/tomcat-connectors-1.1M1.tar.gz)

the follwing error message occurs in catalina_log.2003-07-21.txt on Tomcat start:
2003-07-21 14:31:37 CoyoteConnector Coyote can't register jmx for protocol
2003-07-21 14:31:38 CoyoteConnector Coyote can't register jmx for protocol

This happens regardless of mx4j-jmx.jar location:
- when mx4j-jmx.jar is only in tomcat/server/lib/
- when mx4j-jmx.jar is only in tomcat/common/lib/
- when mx4j-jmx.jar is in both server/lib and common/lib
creator: simon.pabst@web.de
markt@apache.org
text:
As best as I can tell from CVS, the version of the connectors you refer to are 
not intended for that version of tomcat. Use the connectors included in tomcat 
4.1.24 downloads. If you are able to, I suggest you use 4.1.30.
